Issue.creator: simonoberzan
Issue.summary: Make context deadline timeout variable tunable
Issue.description: The context deadline timeout|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/release-1.1/peer/common/peerclient.go#L31 is currently fixed to 3 seconds. In some cases (e.g. when DNS is slow) the connection drops too quickly, so the ability to tune the timeout variable would be great.
